data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Apayao, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Apayao, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Apayao will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 8,692 believers in Apayao to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Apayao, Philippines the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Apayao.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Apayao, Philippines today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Apayao who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
